description: A Human Reform League mobile suit pilot with the rank of 2nd Lieutenant. A product of the Super-Human Institute Labs, Soma was born and bred to become a perfect soldier, and she is designated as "Super-Soldier Number 1." Her body has been modified to adapt to space, and enhancements have been made to her nervous system. She expresses little emotion, whether because of brain alterations or simply due to her unnatural upbringing.
name: Soma Peries
